Irving S. Olds collection of naval and other historical prints and related papers
Irving S. Olds collection of naval and other historical prints and related papers

Print No. S1210. Engraved map, colored: "Novissima et Accuratissima Septentrionalis ac Meridionalis Americae Descripto, multis Locis recentibus aucta et correcte divisa in Omnes Partes Hodiernas per Fredericum de Witt, Amstelodami. Cum Privilegio D.D. Ordinum Holl. West Frisiaeges ex Officina P. Mortier."

Print No. S1210. Engraved map, colored: "Novissima et Accuratissima Septentrionalis ac Meridionalis Americae Descripto, multis Locis recentibus aucta et correcte divisa in Omnes Partes Hodiernas per Fredericum de Witt, Amstelodami. Cum Privilegio D.D. Ordinum Holl. West Frisiaeges ex Officina P. Mortier."
Cartographer - Frederick De Wit (1616-1698). Amsterdam, P. Mortier. [1706?] Map of North and South America, large illustrated cartouche in lower left corner.
